<title level="1" pfs="">[Plague Doctor](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3484)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These healers, often seen wearing distinctive masks and burning powders to defend against airborne plagues, are as much feared as they are respected. To see a plague doctor signals that disease has infested the land—and that it might have already taken hold.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Plague Doctor](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3484)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 62

**Perception** +13

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +9, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42) +13, [Plague Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +13, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (10 bolts), [Healer's Toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2727), _[minor potion of healing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2943)_ (4), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +13 

+2 circumstance to all saves vs. [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 70

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +9 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +10 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 23
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Detect Poison](/Spells.aspx?ID=67), [Cleanse Cuisine](/Spells.aspx?ID=1468) (×2)
- **2nd**
[Clear Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1469) (×2), [Peaceful Rest](/Spells.aspx?ID=1625)
- **3rd**
[Cleanse Affliction](/Spells.aspx?ID=1467) (×2), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×3)

**Cleric Domain Spells** DC 23, 1 Focus Point
- **3rd**
[Healer's Blessing](/Spells.aspx?ID=426)

**Healing Hands**   When the plague doctor casts [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554), they roll d10s instead of d8s.

**Improved Communal Healing**   When the plague doctor casts [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554) targeting a single creature, the plague doctor also restores Hit Points equal to the spell's level to themself or any other creature within range of the spell.

</column>
